easting.description: Easting coordinates in metres, defining the location in the British National Grid spatial reference system.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate, defined based on the requested projection.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate, defined based on the requested projection.

mapLocationAdditionalDetails.description: Additional details of the map location

mapLocationCorrect.description: Whether the map location is correct

northing.description: Northing coordinates in metres, defining the location in the British National Grid spatial reference system.
